title: Message on the Presentation of the Distinguished Flying Cross to Amelia Earhart.
text:
My dear Miss Earhart:

The Vice President has been requested to represent me in presenting to you the Distinguished Flying Cross authorized by the Congress in a Joint Resolution which was approved on July 2nd, 1932.

At the presentation ceremony, I am asking him to hand you this message of congratulations upon the many and well-deserved honors which your knowledge of the science and art of aviation, and your great skill and courageous spirit as a pilot and navigator have brought to you, and through you, to the womanhood of America. Faithfully yours,

HERBERT HOOVER
garbage_collected: [Miss Amelia Earhart, The Ambassador Hotel, Los Angeles, Calif.]
